TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchema extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject

summary.span: XML 結構描述的記憶體內部表示，其依據為全球資訊網協會 (W3C) XML Schema Part 1:Structures (XML 結構描述第 1 部分：結構) 及 XML Schema Part 2:Datatypes (XML 結構描述第 2 部分：資料類型)]。

span.span: An in-memory representation of an XML Schema, as specified in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Schema Part 1: Structures and XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes].

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 請勿使用從未知或未受信任的來源或位置的結構描述。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 如此一來會危及您的程式碼的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 結構描述 （包括內嵌結構描述） 是本質上容易遭到阻絕服務攻擊;不接受這些未受信任的案例中。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 使用所引發的例外狀況類別，例如類別中，可能包含不應公開受信任的案例中的機密資訊。Exceptions raised as a result of using the class, such as the class, may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 例如，屬性傳回至造成例外狀況的結構描述檔案的 URI 路徑。For example, the property of an returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception. 屬性不應公開受信任的案例中。The property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 因此機密資訊不會暴露在不受信任的情況下，就應該正確處理例外狀況。Exceptions should be properly handled so this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios. ## Examples 下列範例會建立結構描述定義。The following example creates a schema definition. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 在上述程式碼範例，會產生下列的 XML 檔案。The following XML file is generated for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/XML/source.xml#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定在結構描述目標命名空間中宣告的屬性 (Attribute) 格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the form for attributes declared in the target namespace of the schema.

value.span: 值，表示目標命名空間中的屬性是否必須以命名空間前置詞限定。

span.span: The value that indicates if attributes from the target namespace are required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必須是其中一個下表所示的值。The value must be one of the values shown in the following table. | 值 Value|描述Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||結構描述中未指定屬性的形式。The attribute form is not specified in schema.| ||目標命名空間的屬性必須以命名空間前置詞限定。Attributes from the target namespace must be qualified with the namespace prefix.| ||從 目標命名空間的屬性並不需要命名空間前置詞限定。Attributes from the target namespace are not required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.| 這個值是目標命名空間中宣告的所有屬性的全域預設值。This value is the global default for all attributes declared in the target namespace. 個別屬性可以覆寫此設定的區域範圍內使用`form`屬性。Individual attributes can override this setting for the local scope using the `form` attribute.

summary.span: 取得或設定 屬性，該屬性設定結構描述之 中項目和複雜型別上 屬性的預設值。

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute which sets the default value of the attribute on element and complex types in the of the schema.

value.span: 值，表示防止衍生的各種方法。

span.span: An value representing the different methods for preventing derivation.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `block`屬性會防止`complexType`或項目具有指定的型別之衍生中的繼承的地方使用`complexType`或項目。The `block` attribute prevents a `complexType` or element that has the specified type of derivation from being used in place of the inherited `complexType` or element. 這個屬性的值可以限制、 擴充功能和替代的泛空白字元分隔清單，或此值可以包含`#all`或擴充功能、 限制或替代子集的清單。This attribute's value can either be a white space separated list of restriction, extension and substitution or the value can contain `#all` or a list that is a subset of extension, restriction, or substitution. 下表列出的可能值。The following table lists the possible values of . |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|根據預設，有結構描述中的型別衍生任何限制。By default, there are no restrictions on type derivations in the schema.| |`Empty`|覆寫預設衍生方法，可讓結構描述中的任何型別衍生。Overrides the default derivation method and allows any type derivations in the schema.| |`Extension`|根據預設，此結構描述中的項目無法由延伸模組衍生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Extension. 僅適用於項目和複雜型別項目。Applies only to element and complex type elements.| |`Restriction`|根據預設，此結構描述中的項目無法由限制衍生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Restriction.| |`Union`|根據預設，此結構描述中的項目都無法衍生以聯集。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Union. 僅適用於簡單的型別。Applies only to simple types.| |`List`|根據預設，此結構描述中的項目無法衍生依據 清單。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by List. 僅適用於簡單的型別。Applies only to simple types.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 依照預設，這個結構描述中的項目不能由任何方法衍生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by any method.|

summary.span: 將 XML 結構描述物件模型 (SOM) 編譯成驗證用的結構描述資訊。

span.span: Compiles the XML Schema Object Model (SOM) into schema information for validation.

summary.span: 用於檢查以程式方式建置的 SOM 的語法和語意結構。

span.span: Used to check the syntactic and semantic structure of the programmatically built SOM.

summary.span: 語意驗證檢查是在編譯階段執行。

span.span: Semantic validation checking is performed during compilation.

summary.span: 將 XML 結構描述物件模型 (SOM) 編譯成驗證用的結構描述資訊。

span.span: Compiles the XML Schema Object Model (SOM) into schema information for validation.

summary.span: 用於檢查以程式方式建置的 SOM 的語法和語意結構。

span.span: Used to check the syntactic and semantic structure of the programmatically built SOM.

summary.span: 語意驗證檢查是在編譯階段執行。

span.span: Semantic validation checking is performed during compilation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 SOM 參考其他命名空間，透過`import`或是`include`項目，`XmlResolver`用來解析這些參考。If the SOM references other namespaces through the `import` or `include` elements, the `XmlResolver` is used to resolve these references. 如果解析程式設定為`null`，這表示，使用者並不關心解決`import`或`include`項目。If the resolver is set to `null`, this indicates that the user does not care about resolving `import` or `include` elements. 在此情況下，不會解析參考。In this case, the references are not resolved. 解析程式不會快取之後`Compile`方法完成。The resolver is not cached after the `Compile` method completes. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法中 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版的過時和已被取代方法。The method is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法會使用類別解析外部參考中的結構描述包含、 匯入或重新定義預設的項目。The method uses the class to resolve external schemas referenced in include, import, or redefine elements by default. 您可以停用傳遞 null 做為外部結構描述解析參數。You can disable resolution of external schemas by passing null as the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `final`屬性會防止項目衍生指定型別或複雜型別。The `final` attribute prevents the specified type of derivation of an element or complex type. 這個值可以包含`#all`或是 extension 或 restriction 的子集的清單。This value can contain `#all` or a list that is a subset of extension or restriction. 下表列出的可能值。The following table lists the possible values of . |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|根據預設，有結構描述中的型別衍生任何限制。By default, there are no restrictions on type derivations in the schema.| |`Empty`|覆寫預設衍生方法，可讓結構描述中的任何型別衍生。Overrides the default derivation method and allows any type derivations in the schema.| |`Extension`|根據預設，此結構描述中的項目無法由延伸模組衍生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Extension. 僅適用於項目和複雜型別項目。Applies only to element and complex type elements.| |`Restriction`|根據預設，此結構描述中的項目無法由限制衍生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Restriction.| |`Union`|根據預設，此結構描述中的項目都無法衍生以聯集。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Union. 僅適用於簡單的型別。Applies only to simple types.| |`List`|根據預設，此結構描述中的項目無法衍生依據 清單。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by List. 僅適用於簡單的型別。Applies only to simple types.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 依照預設，這個結構描述中的項目不能由任何方法衍生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by any method.|

summary.span: 取得或設定結構描述目標命名空間的統一資源識別元 (URI)。

span.span: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the schema target namespace.

value.span: 結構描述目標命名空間。

span.span: The schema target namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是此結構描述中的所有結構描述元件，以及包含使用任何結構描述的命名空間`include`項目。The is the namespace of all schema components in this schema as well as any schema included using the `include` element. 包含的結構描述必須有相同的目標命名空間包含的結構描述，或有沒有指定的目標命名空間。Included schemas must either have the same target namespace as the containing schema or have no target namespace specified.
